alert.note: Alert for Beaver (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 8:58PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Beaver County through 930 PM CDT... At 858 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Floris, or 8 miles northwest of Beaver, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Beaver, Forgan, Mocane, Elmwood and Floris. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for the Panhandle of Oklahoma.
